sentences.en: Buy cheese and meat from your local delicatessen and have it wrapped in paper.
sentences.cn: 从当地的熟食店购买奶酪和肉食，并用纸包裹。

sentences.en: Cardiff's best delicatessen is run by Poles, and so is one of Dorset's best pubs.
sentences.cn: 加的夫最好的熟食店和多赛最好的酒吧都是波兰人开的.

sentences.en: Delicatessen usually require little preparation for serving.
sentences.cn: 熟食一般不需另加烹调便可食用.

sentences.en: I bought some salami from the delicatessen.
sentences.cn: 我在熟食店买了一些意大利香肠.

sentences.en: In A Storm in Summer, his Emmy came for playing an aged Jewish delicatessen 9 owner.
sentences.cn: 在《夏日风暴》中扮演了一位年长的犹太熟食店老板.

sentences.en: Our local delicatessen has a great selection of food.
sentences.cn: 我们家附近的现成菜肴店卖很多种食物.

sentences.en: Our main customers are from gourmet and delicatessen establishments.
sentences.cn: 我们的主要客户是从美食和熟食的机构.

sentences.en: The delicatessen closes at nine o'clock.
Together we scrutinized the twelve lemon cakes from the delicatessen shop.
sentences.cn: 我们一起把甜食店里买来的十二块柠檬蛋糕细细打量了一番.

words.tran_cn: 熟食店；[食品] 熟食品（等于delicatessen）

trans.tran_en: a shop that sells high quality cheeses,  salad s  ,cooked meats etc
